content: stitch letters embroidery monogram or other searches along those lines you ll find great fonts to copy the loop for hanging the ornament is sewn in at the nape of the neck using the same metallic yarn almost done sew in all loose threads and ends close any gaps at the underarm and steam or block as necessary i hope you had fun making your tiny ornament jumper use #tinygildedchristmasjumper when posting photos and share the christmas joy
